questions.question: Both Indeed & Glassdoor are owned by Recruit Holdings. Where is Recruit Holdings headquartered?
questions.statement: Statement after the question: Indeed and Glassdoor are owned by Recruit Holdings, which is a publicly traded company founded in 1960 and headquartered in Tokyo. The company operates through three primary segments: HR Technology, Matching & Solutions, and Staffing. With a workforce of approximately 51,000 employees, Recruit Holdings continues to expand its global presence, offering a wide range of services that connect individuals and businesses across various industries

questions.question: What significant transition is Indeed undergoing to enhance employer experience on its platform?
options: From a job site to a social networking site
From a job site to a recruitment agency
From a job site to a two-sided jobs marketplace
From a job site to a resume-building platform
questions.correctAnswer: From a job site to a two-sided jobs marketplace
questions.statement: Statement after the question: From being the world’s #1 job site, Indeed is now the leading two-sided jobs marketplace that connects job seekers with employers.

questions.question: Which of the following stars have spoken at past Indeed FutureWorks (Global or India)?
questions.statement: Statement after the question: Anil Kumble was a speaker at Indeed FutureWorks Bengaluru in 2023. Trevor Noah and Ryan Reynolds were both speakers at the 2024 and 2022 Indeed FutureWorks events in USA.

questions.question: How much data does Indeed collect in a day to help us match candidates with jobs?
questions.statement: Statement after the question: Indeed collects 320 Terabytes of data, every day. This data comes from every job that is posted or aggregated, every search made, every application sent, every interview completed, and every hire made on Indeed and it feeds our AI matching engine.

questions.question: Which of the following is one of Indeed’s Responsible AI principles?
options: Fairness and Equity at the centre
questions.statement: Statement after the question: Indeed’s 5 Responsible AI principles are Job Seeker First, Fairness and Equity at the centre, Listen and Learn, Innovate Responsibly and Hiring is Human. These principles govern the ethical use of AI at Indeed.

questions.question: When was Indeed founded?
questions.statement: Statement after the question: Indeed was founded in November 2004 by Paul Forster and Rony Kahan in Austin, Texas. Its mission is to help people find jobs by matching job seekers with jobs. Indeed introduced one of the first job search engines with an innovative pay-per-click model for employers. By 2010, it had become the most visited job site in the U.S., leading to its acquisition by Recruit Holdings in 2012, fueling global expansion. A 2020 partnership with Glassdoor further enhanced recruitment solutions, and by 2023, Indeed operated in over 60 countries, connecting millions of job seekers and employers.

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of using Sponsored Jobs on Indeed?
questions.statement: Statement after the question: Sponsored Jobs posted directly on Indeed have 2.3X more applications than non-sponsored jobs Source: Indeed data (IN)

questions.question: Where else will your job be seen if you have posted a job on Indeed?
questions.statement: Statement after the question: All jobs posted on Indeed will also be seen by job seekers on Glassdoor. Jobs sponsored on Indeed are also pushed through our Specialist and Trusted Media Networks, including sites like StackOverflow and Wired (for tech roles) and Google.

questions.question: How many jobs are posted on Indeed every second?
questions.statement: Statement after the question: On average, 11 jobs are posted on Indeed every second. As per Indeed’s worldwide data (2023 average), more than one job seeker is hired every 3 seconds on Indeed.

questions.question: How many job seeker profiles does Indeed have globally?
questions.statement: Statement after the question: Indeed has 580 Million job seeker profiles* which are available to 3.5 Million employers globally.

questions.question: Which of the following features are included in Indeed's Smart Sourcing product?
questions.statement: Statement after the question: Indeed’s Smart Sourcing product combines the best of resume search and AI-driven matching, with features like Matched Candidates, AI-driven candidate highlights, Smart Message and more.

questions.question: Which of the following insights can employers gather from the Employer Branding Hub, by Indeed & Glassdoor?
questions.statement: Statement after the question: You can use Employer Branding hub to manage employee reviews,Customize content and share updates, connect to your social media, dig into your employee experience, understand job seeker behavior, and measure work wellbeing.

questions.question: How does the Employer Branding Hub help employers respond to reviews?
options: By offering a single dashboard for timely engagement
By outsourcing responses to third-party teams
questions.correctAnswer: By offering a single dashboard for timely engagement
questions.statement: Statement after the question: Tell a powerful brand story to a wide talent pool with world-class employer branding tools. The Employer Branding Hub includes unique branding opportunities to manage your brand across Glassdoor + Indeed in one simple place, with robust insights and analytics to inform your strategy and streamline your process.

questions.question: Which professional networking platform did Glassdoor acquire in 2021?
questions.statement: Statement after the question: In 2021, Glassdoor, a leader in workplace insights, acquired Fishbowl, a professional networking platform that fosters industry-specific conversations and community building. This strategic acquisition allowed Glassdoor to enhance its offerings by integrating real-time workplace discussions, empowering professionals to exchange insights, share experiences, and build connections within their industries.

questions.question: How does Indeed Smart Sourcing identify candidates who are likely to respond?
options: By analyzing their job search activity and engagement history
By conducting surveys with job seekers
By matching based on certifications only
questions.correctAnswer: By analyzing their job search activity and engagement history
questions.statement: Demo Area 3 (Smart Sourcing + Features Activation) - Pre-Function 1.
